    • 方法详细资料

      • load

        public java.lang.Object load(ApplicationCall call,
                             java.lang.String transport,
                             kotlin.coroutines.experimental.Continuation<java.lang.Object> $continuation)

        Load session value from transport string for the specified call

        It is recommended to perform lookup asynchronously if there is an external session store

        返回:
        session instance or null if session was not found

      • store

        public java.lang.Object store(ApplicationCall call,
                              java.lang.Object value,
                              kotlin.coroutines.experimental.Continuation<? super java.lang.String> $continuation)

        Store session value and return respective transport string for the specified call.

        Override if there is existing session.
